name: Mountain Lion Cork Yoga Mat | 3.5MM OR 4.5MM
description:
RETH-INK COLLECTION
The Mountain Lion art captures the spirit of resilience and inner strength. With powerful and hand-drawn mountain lion, this mat symbolizes courage, confidence, and inspiration to trust your own path.
Improved sizing: This standard size is now upgraded to 26" wide! Embrace the sweat. The Scoria Cork mat delivers traction when sweating with no slip. 
Features

Includes a free cotton mat carry strap

Backed by natural tree rubber (unlike other mats with synthetic TPE/PVC)
ultra-grip with sweat, lose the towel
naturally anti-microbial cork surface eliminating odor
sustainably harvested

for a non-toxic home or practice
Spritz water to activate sweat-grip in colder practices until body is warm.
Backed by a 1 Year Limited Warranty ~ find details here


Specs


 72" x 26" | 2.8 kg or 3.1 kg

thickness: choice of 3.5mm or 4.5mm
plastic free packaging
100% natural cork
FSC natural rubber

Possible allergens; natural rubber latex.
Clean & Care
Always roll CORK side out.Store in shade.No need to clean it often, as it is antimicrobial.Simply wipe with a soft cloth, soap & water.
Please note: due to the difference of digital screens, colours may differ slightly.
Yogis Featured
 @_melissayogi, @silence_yoga_retreats, @moonlightsoulchild

Special Artist Feature

This grounding bear illustration was created by Amy, a Canadian artist based in Vancouver. By day, Amy is a graphic designer who works in the natural health industry in beautiful downtown Vancouver.  Her motto is “A creative life is a hell of a lot more of an interesting life.” By night, she switches to her favourite gig, using creativity to paint. She takes on projects to illustrate for different brands across North America. Find Amy on Instagram! @amysaysamy

This yoga mat, designed by the shop owner, features art inspired by children’s stories, encouraging adults to rewild their playful spirit. Updated width: Our wide mat is 30" wide giving you 4" extra inches from our currently new updated standard mats! Don't fret the sweat, embrace it. The Scoria Cork mat delivers supreme traction when sweating with no slip. 
Features

Comes with our cotton mat carry strap

Backed by natural tree rubber unlike other mats with synthetic TPE/PVC
ultra-grip with sweat, lose the towel
naturally anti-microbial cork surface eliminating odor
sustainably harvested
perfect for hot yoga, gentle yoga, meditation, stretching
for a non-toxic home or practice
Spray with water to activate sweat-grip in cold practices until body is warm.
Backed by a 1 Year Limited Warranty ~ find details here


Scoria Gives
Every purchase makes an impact! Portion of proceeds empower Indigenous youth through play-based education promoting healthy living and life-skills  ~ learn more
Specs


72" x 30" | 4 kg

thickness: 4.5mm (studio)
plastic free packaging
100% natural cork and rubber

Possible allergens; natural rubber latex.
Use & Care
After sweating, lay the mat to dry, then roll & store.Always roll CORK side out.Store in shade and avoid long sun exposure.To clean, simply wipe with a cloth, a little soap and warm water.Not machine washable. 



Please note: due to the difference of digital screens, colours may differ slightly.

name: Kids Align Play & Cork Yoga Mat
description:
KIDS COLLECTION
Scoria's cork mats are the world's first ever cork yoga mats for kids.  Creating a non-toxic environment for our children is crucial, so we aimed to provide them with a natural play and yoga mat.
Features

Includes a free cotton mat carry strap

Backed by natural tree rubber (unlike other mats with synthetic TPE/PVC)
Safe mat and non-toxic for kids

naturally anti-microbial cork surface eliminating odor
excellent for family & kids classes, and a great play mat
sustainably harvested

for a non-toxic home or practice
Spritz water to activate sweat-grip in colder practices
Backed by a 1 Year Limited Warranty ~ find details here


Specs


 59" x 23" | 2 kg 

thickness: 3mm
plastic free packaging
100% natural cork
FSC natural rubber

Possible allergens; natural rubber latex.
About the art
Children can follow along the lines and fish pattern to improve their asanas. And it makes a great non-toxic play mat.This yoga mat is designed by shop owner and artist, and is interpreted art from children's stories. This fun colourful fish print helps align postures in a playful way. Use the lines to align feet in Warrior II, and the fish to enjoy a creative transition between asanas.
Clean & Care
Always roll CORK side out.Store in shade.No need to clean it often, as it is antimicrobial.Simply wipe with a soft cloth, soap & water.
Yogis Featured
@kerispilatesroom , @kelly_ross, @thefairlylocalvegan

name: Essential Round Cork Yoga Mat | Multi-use | 53" dia
description:
THE ROUND COLLECTION
Enhance your space with our Round Cork Yoga Mats; crafted from 100% natural cork and FSC-certified rubber. This mat brings functional beauty to home practice corners, stretching nooks, or cozy meditation areas. Each round mat is designed to feel like a natural extension of your space. It is non-toxic, calming, and artfully inspiring.
Our Essential design is a minimal, logo-only mat for grounding with no distractions; pure cork, pure intention. Best for those who want an open space to let their imagination run wild.
Features

Round and Circular yoga, stretch or home mat
100% natural cork & natural tree rubber
Even though it is large for travel, it still includes a free cotton mat carry strap

Backed by natural tree rubber (unlike other mats with synthetic TPE/PVC)
ultra-grip activated with sweat 

naturally anti-microbial cork surface eliminating odor
sustainably harvested

for a non-toxic home or practice


For meditation, it's perfect under our meditation cushions or Zabutons.
Every purchase gives, scroll down to read more.
Backed by a 1 Year Limited Warranty ~ find details here


Specs


 53" circle | approx. 4 kg

thickness: 4.5mm (studio)
plastic free packaging
100% natural cork
Backed by FSC natural rubber

Possible allergens; natural rubber latex.
Clean & Care
Always roll cork side outStore in shade when not in useAntimicrobial cork surface requires minimal cleaningWipe with soft cloth, mild soap, and water as needed

Our Color Strokes mat is smaller than our other rounds and matches the size of our Baby Round Mats for versatile use. Perfect for a baby’s room or an adult’s zen corner, it evokes a sense of joy and playfulness. Celebrate color and brighten up your meditation space or cozy home nook with this vibrant, artful piece.
Features

Round and Circular yoga, stretch or home mat
100% natural cork & natural tree rubber
Even though it is large for travel, it still includes a free cotton mat carry strap

Backed by natural tree rubber (unlike other mats with synthetic TPE/PVC)
ultra-grip activated with sweat 

naturally anti-microbial cork surface eliminating odor
sustainably harvested

for a non-toxic home or practice


For meditation, it's perfect under our meditation cushions or Zabutons.

name: Elephant Walk Round Baby Mat - Cork Yoga Mat | Play & Stretch | 47" dia
description:
THE BABY COLLECTION
Make playtime safe, fun, and beautifully natural. The Baby Collection features our smallest round mats, crafted from 100% natural cork and FSC-certified rubber. This mat is designed especially for the little ones. Whether it's tummy time, crawling, or quiet cuddles, these mats bring non-toxic comfort to nurseries, bedrooms or playrooms. Each mat is calming to the touch, easy to clean, and free from harmful toxins. 
The Elephant Walk design features earthy tones sparking curiosity, making it the perfect floor for storytelling, stretching, or sensory play.
